title: Hierarchical Spawn Dynamics & Critical Frequency Mapping

key_findings.note: All tested frequencies show population growth; critical f < min tested (extrapolated)

frequency_response_analysis.note: All tested frequencies show population growth; critical f < min tested (extrapolated)

v7_failure.hypothesis: Spawn logic depends on migration for population rebalancing

v8_failure.failure_mode: Stuck state after initial work (15-22% CPU)
v8_failure.hypothesis: Migration with n_pop=1 creates pathological state

edge_case_analysis.pattern: Hierarchical parameter boundaries expose implementation assumptions
edge_case_analysis.lesson: Edge cases (n_pop=1, f_migrate=0.0) should be tested in isolation or skipped
